h1.style: margin: 0px 0px 1.2em; padding: 0px; font-size: 2.25rem; line-height: 1.1em; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

img.style: width: 500px; height: 67px; float: left; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid;

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.3em 0px 0.5em; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); line-height: 1.25em; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
margin: 0px; padding: 0.3em 0px 0.5em; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); line-height: 1.25em; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
margin: 0px; padding: 0.3em 0px 0.5em; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); line-height: 1.25em; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

h2.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.3em 0px 0.5em; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); line-height: 1.25em; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

span.span: Modernize, increase speed and meet customer demands.

h3.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.3em 0px 0.5em; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); line-height: 1.25em; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

span.span: Celeriti™ is CSC's end-to-end suite of SOA-based enterprise software for banking, cards, payments and lending. Celeriti gives financial services organizations of all sizes the latest technology at a lower cost of ownership. With Celeriti you can gain speed and certainty, and:

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 2em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
li.span: Achieve a flexible, easy-to-integrate systems environment

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
li.span: Take advantage of the latest deployment models

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
li.span: Support global processing and international operations.

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.4em 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;
p.span: Unlike software from other vendors or systems developed in house, CSC's Celeriti provides a modern, scalable, componentized architecture with sophisticated and highly flexible capabilities that adapt your organization’s processing to changing business requirements quickly and easily.

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.4em 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;
p.span:
New Celeriti Products
At the heart of the Celeriti software suite are five components of modern technology. The Web Portal User Interface extends Web 2.0 technologies to the front and back office. Reusable SOA Business Processes and Web Services enable easier integration and maintenance of systems. The Business Intelligence and enterprisewide Data Warehouse allow you to drive business strategies based on actionable data. Business Rules and Parameters help streamline product creation and editing. And the Celeriti Distributed Platform Architecture expands usability.

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.4em 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;
p.span: Celeriti also forms the basis for premise-free banking and cards processing, allowing banks to take advantage of software as a service (SaaS), cloud-based infrastructure and business process outsourcing services.

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.4em 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;
p.span:
Celeriti Components and Progressive Modernization
CSC clients currently using Hogan® Banking Systems or CAMS II™ Card & Merchant System can achieve Celeriti capabilities by implementing the separate Celeriti components as needed. CSC delivers these through an approach called Progressive Modernization that lets you update your systems environment incrementally according to business needs and priorities. Choose some or all of Celeriti’s components:

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 2em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
li.span: Web Portal User Interface (168 KB PDF)

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
li.span: SOA Business Processes and Web Services (338 KB PDF)

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
li.span: Business Intelligence and Data Warehouse (274 KB PDF)

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 17px; line-height: 1.5em; list-style: none; background: url(http://www.csc.com/assets/new/triangles.png) 0px -189px no-repeat;

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0.4em 0px; color: rgb(116, 118, 120); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 18px;
p.span: Progressive Modernization is truly the lowest-cost, lowest-risk path to new technology compared to a rip-and-replace project. New components are delivered in smaller updates that can coexist with your current capabilities, allowing gradual cutover to the new capabilities. CSC can work with you to develop a customized roadmap, a unique transformation plan that aligns CSC’s solutions and capabilities with your plans and strategies.
